version_name: 2.0 now has support for Google Drive

version_description:
- Resolves issue where some users were unable to hide courses
- Various additional improvements and bug fixes

You can now set your avatar and let others know when you’re away during Collaborate sessions!

Improvements and Fixes:
- Resolves issue where hidden course content was still visible on grades

Improvements and Fixes:
- Support for Arabic and Hebrew
- Fixes issue where some users were unable join Collaborate sessions
Various improvements and fixes.

Discussions now support sub-replies - meaning you can now reply to a reply.
Bug fixes and other improvements

If you are wondering what happened to Bb Student, don’t worry – this is the same app. We’ve just changed the name to “Blackboard” and freshened up the icon. The functionality remains the same, except for:
- Added support for the Catalan language
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

We listened to your feedback and made some big updates in this release:
- Tablet Support: The Blackboard app now provides an optimized experience no matter what type of device you use.
- Simplified Navigation: The new course overview screen makes it easy to get to course content, grades, announcements, and discussions.
- Faster Performance: We cleaned things up to make the app quicker, such as reducing some animations.
- New Discussion Indicator: See which posts are new in discussions.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

We are very excited to add support for organizations to the Blackboard app! For every organization in which you are a participant, you can now access content, view announcements, and participate in discussions.

We’ve also fixed some bugs and improved performance.

With the Blackboard app, you can now download course files and view them offline when you have limited or no internet connectivity. We’ve also fixed various bugs in this release.

Like the Blackboard app? Make sure to leave a review!

With the Blackboard app, you can now download course files and view them offline when you have limited or no internet connectivity. We’ve also fixed various bugs in this release.

Like the Blackboard app? Make sure to leave a review!

You’ll now get push notifications when new announcements, content, and tests are available!

We’ve also fixed various bugs and made some performance improvements in this release.

Have an iPhone X? Next month’s update will introduce an optimized experience for iPhone X users!

Have a Collaborate session scheduled by your instructor, but can’t remember when it starts? Collaborate sessions are now listed inside your courses! Tap on the Collaborate tool, select the session, and instantly join the virtual classroom.

iPhone X users now also have an optimized experience when using the Blackboard app!

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure you rate us and leave a review!

Snapped a great photo or video and want to show it to your class? Have a document to share? With this update, you’ll be able to share files from your device or cloud storage in discussion posts! If you don’t see this feature immediately, don’t worry. We’re working with your institution to make it available.

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review!

In this release, we expanded your cloud storage options by integrating Apple Files. Now you can choose from a variety of cloud storage providers when you upload media and files into courses.

We’ve also fixed quite a few bugs! Including:

In this release we’ve greatly improved support for Ultra courses! You’ll now see improvements in multimedia support when embedded in documents as well as access to a brand-new assessment experience that will let you take/submit your tests and assignments from anywhere on the go!

We’ve also fixed some bugs - including:
-An issue where multimedia was not displaying in forum descriptions
-HTML files not rendering properly
-Truncation of course information for some languages

If your school has Ultra navigation, your course list will have a fresh look and feel!

You’ll have course cards with images so it’s easier than ever to find the right course.

Favoriting is now super simple—tap the star to bump your most important courses to the top for quick access.

We updated learning modules in your Ultra courses to give you a better visual indicator of your progress and requirements to view content and assessments.

We fixed a number of bugs:
-Issue where iPad users were unable to launch YouTube videos in full screen
-Crash experienced when accepting terms of use
-Missing countdown timer on timed tests
-Incorrect rounding of grades in the course overview
-Issue where some content was not rendering when downloaded and viewed offline

We updated announcements with a new look and feel that makes access quicker than ever. We extended the announcements feature to Ultra courses, so you can now view announcements for both Ultra and Original courses.

We also fixed some bugs related to assignment submissions and grades display.

Thank you to everyone for your comments and feedback in the reviews! We’re listening and are making quick updates to resolve issues!

In this release we’ve:
•Fixed an issue where users were frequently logged out and had to constantly log back in
•Resolved an issue where the app was not properly loading after being placed in the background and then re-opened
•Fixed an issue where notifications resulted in a frozen app when tapped
•Various other bug and crash fixes

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review! If you’re having a problem, use our in-app feedback to report a problem!

Thank you again to everyone for providing helpful comments and feedback!

In this release we’ve:
•Fixed a notification bug that caused users to experience an app freeze when trying to load assignments, tests, and announcements
•Fixed an issue where users saw an error when trying to open an organization from the grades/marks section
•Improved the performance when loading grades/marks

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review! If you’re having an issue, use our in-app feedback to report the problem!

In this update we fixed a crash that some users were experiencing when loading the activity stream.

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review! If you’re having an issue, use our in-app feedback to report the problem!

We’re very excited introduce Ally into the Blackboard App! Ally provides a way for you to generate alternative formats for course content. If you currently see Ally in the web browser view of your course, you can now use in the app, too!

For example, do you learn better by listening to audio instead of reading text? We’ve got you covered—Ally can generate a downloadable MP3 from a PDF your instructor provided.

We also fixed:
- Issue where announcement text was cut off on iPads in landscape mode
- Issue where a blank screen showed after a user put the app into the background and then reopened
- Crash when a user navigated through the app while offline

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review! If you’re having a problem, use our in-app feedback to report a problem!

In this release we’ve made some improvements and bug fixes – including:

- Improvements to app when poor network conditions are present
- Fixed a blank screen / freeze issue for some users when opening notifications
- Crash that occurred when browsing the app under poor network conditions

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review! If you’re having a problem, use our in-app feedback to report a problem!

We fixed these issues in this release:
- Error when users attached files to an assignment from the photo album
- A content loading issue (401 error) for some users
- Bottom navigation bar wasn’t visible when users navigated through some content and tools
- Crash when users with low connectivity opened the activity stream
- App didn’t display Ally alternative formats option when users accessed content through activity stream or push notifications

You’ll now see an updated landing page when opening the app that matches the web experience.

We’ve also fixed the following bugs:
- Ungraded items were not shown for Ultra courses
- 401 error when opening content in some courses
- Issue where links in feedback were not working properly
- Ally alternative format option not available in some course content

We made some minor updates and bug fixes in this release.

We updated the way you access your cloud storage accounts in the app. You no longer need to manage each individual account. Instead, you can access iCloud and other cloud storage through your device’s Files app.

Thank you for all the feedback! We’re working hard to make updates to the app!

In this release we’ve:
- Improved support for content linked in files when offline
- Fixed an issue where users were unable to access grade details and feedback in Ultra courses
- Fixed an issue that incorrectly labeled "draft" discussion board posts as "submitted"

If you are experiencing issues logging in to the app, please reach out to your school/institution as they manage access to your courses.

In this release we’ve added messages to your courses!

You’ll now be able to:
• Access all messages from your courses
• Add rich text and media when composing messages
• Receive push notifications for new messages

We’ve also made some small improvements and bug fixes.

In this release we’ve fixed an issue that resulted in a crash when accessing Course Messages

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review! If you’re having a problem, use our in-app feedback to report a problem!

In this release we’ve fixed a crash when opening courses, squashed some small bugs, and made some minor improvements.

Enjoying the Blackboard app? Make sure to rate us and leave a review!

In this release we’ve fixed:
- An issue where grades for tests are not shown when the test has been made unavailable in an Original course
- An error when opening BeeLine Reader alternative formats
- A problem where incorrect announcements were loading when opened on the activity stream
- An issue where course pages do not properly load after viewing content

In this release we’ve added improvements to Collab!

You’ll now be able to:
• Access all recordings available in collab
• Receive reminders for live collab session

We’ve also made some small improvements and bug fixes.
